title: Taric's new splash?
body:
http://i.imgur.com/xDcu1tA.jpg

As the person who kept crying about more fanservice for women and gayfolk, I think the cleavage is a bit much.

Otherwise

O U T R A G E O U S
U 
T
R
A
G
E
O 
U 
S

EDIT: My comments on the cleavage is that is looked a bit too tacky, but I guess he IS the Aspect of tackiness.

replies.body:
...So that axe is his new weapon. 

But it looks Noxian in design, and he's from Demacia. So the axe has to have come from Targon. 

Why would there be a Noxian axe there?  Maybe I'm too focused on the axe design being Noxian.
It's hard to see in that splash, but its actually a three pronged Mace :)

Mace?

MACE?

{{champion:82}} Approves!

MACE BUDDIES
:^)
No longer pizza feet buddies :(
I ship it
I cant believe I'm saying this, but I actually want to play duo lane morde now.

Q gems of spades
W Outrageous of sorrows
E Opals of destruction
R children of the gem
We gotta do Taric+Mordekaiser bot, its going to be glorious and outrageous :P
I actually think their kits combined will be insane as well :)
{{champion:82}} + {{champion:44}} The Paladins of Pain
Death Knight + Paladin Synergy!

> [{quoted}](name=Reav3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=KYpEU8rj,comment-id=00010003,timestamp=2016-04-04T19:04:59.766+0000)
>
> It's hard to see in that splash, but its actually a three pronged Mace :)

Hey not sure who exactly was responsible for this idea, but I love how you guys thematically tied in taric shedding all his armor as he ascends the mountain! Even if the old taric wasn't exactly canonical now, it was a neat way to acknowledge his past
And the shopkeeper even found his old hammer :)
Will the hammer stay with the shopkeeper or we have other bard moment? Personally i would like the hammer to stay.

> three pronged Mace :)
3 pronged mace?......
3 HIT EFFECT??!?!??!?!
Taric is from Targon now. And he was never Demacian.
The comic refers to him as a demacian.

I do not know what comic you speak of. 
I just know Taric is from another world/plane and was summoned to Runeterra somehow. 
And Taric decided to stay and help these people. 

And now he's going to be from Targon.
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/site/taric-comic/
OMG!! Yes!! That was beautiful :')
Take a closer look at his weapon,its actually no axe,but a staff/mace as it doesn't have any sharp edges.
Where...the..FUCK... Are his shield and hammer...
Showing his Hammer would be wildly inappropriate in public.  As for his Shield, well Taric doesn't believe in using protection.

http://45.media.tumblr.com/cf06f5adc84c3dea73ec55bba13fe641/tumblr_mn4rcwJbMK1r5lqijo1_500.gif 

woo
There is no such thing as too much male cleavage.

See, this is how I want Riot to address the fact that they have too many sexy women, not by making the women unsexy, but by making more sexy men.

Everybody gets to jerk it. Seems fair to me.
Like those nuns who have their skirts a little too high, just to show enough ankle. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

All I see is

http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/degrassi/images/0/02/Fabio-top-web.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20140531033324

*Accurate Representation of Current Taric Vs New One*

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/yiRY5ecXYoc/hqdefault.jpg

reminds me of fabio 
http://bbsimg.ngfiles.com/1/23144000/ngbbs4e407d2f92754.gif

We are the crystal gems. We always save the day. And if you think we can't, we'll always find a way! That's why the people of this world believe in...

Riot's Champion Update team because they create masterpieces like this sexy hunk \*swoons*

I...am the knight of gems.
I'll always save the day.
But when I got bot with Ez?
Well, things get kinda gay.
There's a bucket beside me, filled with so much man juice and joy it's unreal. ANOTHER MANLY BADASS SUPPORT WOO!

So boobs cleavage is okay but once it's for the females or gay it's not okay anymore?
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

> [{quoted}](name=SweetDisaster,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=KYpEU8rj,comment-id=0011,timestamp=2016-04-04T19:24:34.585+0000)
>
> So boobs cleavage is okay but once it's for the females or gay it's not okay anymore?
> {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

No, they're saying the very open wide V neck might be much. 

Especially considering he's in a freezing environment. 

There might be an explanation for it later on though.

That being said, I don't really care either way. 

He's hot and that's all that matters because Taric deserves to be beautiful after all these years.

Well i mean isn't Braum shirtless?

And i totally agree on the last sentence he's hot af
